creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: postage-stamp sized image: standing male figure in breeches and white shirt standing with back to viewer, holding a stick and with a basket on his back; angled toward rear; shadow of another figure LRQ, possibly seated
marks:
in graphite on mounting sheet: G224 | 559005
in
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until October 16, 1991; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Ragman
